full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 462 Filed 11/15/21 Page 13 of 32 Juror ID: 21a. If yes, is there anything about that experience that would prevent you from acting as a fair and impartial juror in this case? Yes No 23b. If yes to 23a, please explain: -12- DOJ-OGR-00007029
